metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13240 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The DMS/ECM module in Dolibarr 11.0.4 allows users with the 'Setup documents directories' permission to rename uploaded files to have insecure file extensions. This bypasses the .noexe protection mechanism against XSS.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
